definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: MSG also known as MSG by flavor agent, a white crystal-like.
sentences.chinese: 味精也稱爲味精增味劑，呈白色晶體狀。

sentences.english: MSG also known as MSG by flavor agent, a white crystal-like.
sentences.chinese: 味精也稱爲味精增味劑，呈白色晶體狀。

sentences.english: Most of the food manufacturers still add MSG into their food.
sentences.chinese: 大多數食品製造商仍在食品中添加味精。

sentences.english: My mother is health-conscious and prepares food with little MSG and salt.
sentences.chinese: 我媽媽非常注意飲食健康，做菜時放很少的味精和鹽。

sentences.english: Customer It's important that you do because I'm allergic to MSG.
sentences.chinese: 你千萬別忘了，因爲我對味精過敏。

sentences.english: Thanks for your reminding, could you tell the chef not to put the MSG in it?
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你的提醒，您能告訴廚師不要往菜裏放味精嗎？

sentences.english: The result showed that the loss of GA is very small after MSG mother liquor desalted in IEP.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明味精母液在等電點脫鹽後，穀氨酸損失很小。

sentences.english: MSG is a major trigger for me.
sentences.chinese: 味精對我而言是一個主要的過敏原。

sentences.english: The chicken, the gravy, and even the rice all have monosodium glutamate added.
sentences.chinese: 雞，肉汁，甚至水稻都有添加味精。

sentences.english: Ok. But, please don't put any MSG.
sentences.chinese: 好的，但是，請不要放味精。

sentences.english: This paper may be of significant value to the improvement of control systems for glutamate fermentation tank.
sentences.chinese: 這對改進味精發酵罐的控制系統有着十分重要的意義。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, the chicken in the salads also has MSG.
sentences.chinese: 這並不奇怪，因爲在雞肉沙拉中也有味精。

sentences.english: I only use Accent for soup.
Henan lotus gourmet power group lotus habiliment co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 河南省蓮花味精集團蓮花服裝有限公司。

sentences.english: Contains the flavor enhancer, MSG (monosodium glutamate) which causes headaches and allergic reactions.
sentences.chinese: 在增味劑中加入的味精會導致頭痛過敏反應。

sentences.english: In China, where I live, you don't hear many complaints about MSG allergy.
sentences.chinese: 在我生活的中國，你很少會聽到味精過敏一類的投訴。

definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
